description: ChatGPT Plus will be available free for select users in the coming weeks, OpenAI announced. Usually priced at $20 (roughly Rs. 1,700) per month, a ChatGPT Plus subscription offers features access to advanced reasoning models, additional messaging, file uploads, image generation, and limited access to Sora video generation.
title: ChatGPT Plus Free Access for Select Users Announced Until the End of May

description: CMF Phone 2 is expected to launch soon, and a redesigned matte finish rear panel has been teased by Nothing's subsidiary CMF. A recent report suggests that the upcoming CMF Phone 2 handset is expected to feature a triple rear camera setup, and the same Accessory Point system available on the first generation CMF Phone 1.
title: CMF Phone 2 Rear Panel With Textured Design Teased by Nothing Ahead of Debut

description: Several upcoming smartphones, from budget to premium, are launching in India this month ahead of the summer holidays. The Realme Narzo 80x features a 6,000mAh battery, the Vivo V50e focuses on photography with a curved display, and the iQOO Z10x targets budget gamers. These upcoming releases cater to various needs and preferences, so read on to know more about these upcoming smartphones.
title: Upcoming Smartphones Scheduled to Launch in India in April: Expected Specifications, Features

description: April brings a host of major game releases across platforms, from remastered PlayStation titles to Xbox exclusives. The Last of Us Part II Remastered makes its way to PC this month, bringing upgraded visuals, PC-specific features, and bonus content. A couple of major Xbox and PC exclusives arrive on PS5 this month, as well.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, South of Midnight, Indiana Jones and More: The Biggest Games of April

description: A federal judge has scheduled a March 16 trial for Elon Musk's lawsuit challenging Sam Altman's plan to restructure OpenAI into a for-profit entity. US District Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers rejected Musk's request to halt the transformation but expedited the trial to address Musk's claim that the restructuring is unlawful.
title: Musk-Altman Fight Over OpenAI Overhaul Set for March Trial

description: OnePlus 13T launch in China will soon be announced by the company, and teasers for the handset's compact design and premium features has already begun to surface. While official specifications remain under wraps, recent leaks suggest it will debut as the first compact phone powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chip. Here's everything you need to know about the OnePlus 13T ahead of its launch in China later this month.
title: OnePlus 13T Launch: Design, Specifications and Everything We Know So Far About the Compact Handset

description: Oppo Reno 14 Pro has been spotted in a leaked render that reveals an updated design. It is expected to feature a triple rear camera setup housed in a revamped camera island. The handset might also sport a flat OLED screen and introduce a programmable 'Magic Cube' button.
title: Oppo Reno 14 Pro Key Specifications, Design Render Showing Redesigned Camera Layout Leaked

description: Meta aims to launch the latest version of its large language model, Llama 4, this month, but delays remain possible, according to a report in The Information. Following OpenAI's success with ChatGPT, major tech firms are heavily investing in AI infrastructure to remain competitive in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.
title: Meta Nears Release of New AI Model Llama 4 in April: Report
